query: DELETE FROM checklistItemResults WHERE taskChecklistId IN (SELECT id FROM taskChecklists WHERE taskId = 1); DELETE FROM defects WHERE taskId = 1; UPDATE taskChecklists SET status = 'pending', inspectedBy = NULL, inspectedAt = NULL WHERE taskId = 1; UPDATE tasks SET status = 'in_progress' WHERE id = 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute DELETE FROM checklistItemResults WHERE taskChecklistId IN (SELECT id FROM taskChecklists WHERE taskId = 1); DELETE FROM defects WHERE taskId = 1; UPDATE taskChecklists SET status = 'pending', inspectedBy = NULL, inspectedAt = NULL WHERE taskId = 1; UPDATE tasks SET status = 'in_progress' WHERE id = 1;
